content: Compose a sonnet using words that only start with vowels.

In an abyss, an echo answers, "Ahh!"
Underneath the azure, aerial ambiance,
An ode to the ethereal, an elegy,
In ivy-clad alcoves, where angels arrange.

An aura of elegance, an evanescent sigh,
In the oasis of an oasis, an oasis,
An anthem to the aesthetic, an assonant phrase,
An epiphany in the abyss, an apparition.

An onyx obsidian, an opaline ocean,
In the aviary of the avian, an aria,
An affirmation of the aesthetic, an allure.

An ode to the aesthetic, an aesthetic art,
In the avenue of the aesthetic, an anthem,
An oasis in the abyss, an aesthetic heart.
